description: first half, ff. 308. 233 x 162; 170 x 105 mm. 25 lin. 19th cen. Gloss on al-Sanūsīʼs ʻUmdat ahl al-tawfīq, ed. by the glossatorʼs pupil Muḥammad al-Dasūqī: Brockelmann, GAL, S II, 353 (I, gloss e). Incip.: ... أما بعد فىقول ... الدسوقى ... هذه تقىىدات على شرح الکبرى من تقرىر شىخنا ...
author: Ṣaʻīdī, ʻAlī ibn Aḥmad, 1700-1775
title: ḥāshiyah ʻalá sharḥ ʻAqīdat ahl al-tawḥīd al-kubrá.
contributor: Dasūqī, Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻArafah, d. 1815
creator: Ṣaʻīdī, ʻAlī ibn Aḥmad, 1700-1775
subject: Sanūsī, Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf, ca. 1427-ca. 1490—ʻUmdat ahl al-tawfīq wa-al-tasdīd fī sharḥ ʻAqīdat ahl al-tawḥīd.
